variants.Description in input context: A missense mutation in SNCA (p.G21D) associated with familial Parkinson's disease.
A missense mutation in SNCA (p.G39D) linked to α-synuclein aggregation and Lewy body formation.
A missense mutation in LRRK2 (p.G538D) associated with Parkinson's disease and increased kinase activity.
A missense mutation in GBA (p.R281W) linked to lysosomal dysfunction and increased α-synuclein accumulation.
A missense mutation in PRNP (p.G193D) associated with prion-like propagation of α-synuclein.
A missense mutation in MAPT (p.G347D) associated with microtubule instability and tau pathology in Parkinson's.

Material used.Description: Immunohistochemistry was performed on brain tissues from transgenic mice expressing mutant α-synuclein (p.G21D and p.G39D).

Readout description.Result Description: Increased α-synuclein aggregation and Lewy body formation in the substantia nigra of mice with p.G21D mutation.
Enhanced α-synuclein oligomerization and neurodegeneration in the cortex of mice with p.G39D mutation.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent cohorts of transgenic mice were analyzed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each brain region was analyzed in triplicate.

Non-coding RNA.Non-coding RNA: miR-7 and miR-153, which regulate SNCA expression.

Epigenetic factors: Hypermethylation of the SNCA promoter in dopaminergic neurons
Histone acetylation at the GBA locus in lysosomal dysfunction

Material used.Description: Lysosomal enzyme activity was measured in human neurons expressing mutant GBA (p.R281W).

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced glucocerebrosidase activity and accumulation of glycosphingolipids in neurons with p.R281W mutation.

Biological replicates.Description: Five independent cultures of human neurons were tested.

Technical replicates.Description: Each culture was analyzed in duplicate.

Epigenetic factors: Hypomethylation at the GBA promoter in lysosomal dysfunction

Material used.Description: LRRK2 kinase activity was assessed in HEK29细胞 expressing mutant LRRK2 (p.G538D).

Readout description.Result Description: Increased phosphorylation of Rab10 and 12, impairing autophagy and mitochondrial dynamics.

Technical replicates.Description: Each transfection was analyzed in triplicate.

Environmental factors.Environmental factors: Mitochondrial dysfunction and impaired protein degradation.

Epigenetic factors: Hyperacetylation of the LRRK2 promoter in dopaminergic neurons

Material used.Description: Prion-like propagation of α-synuclein was tested in Neuro2a cells overexpressing mutant PRNP (p.G193D).

Readout description.Result Description: Enhanced α-synuclein seeding and propagation in Neuro2a cells with p.G193D mutation.

Technical replicates.Description: Each transfection was analyzed in duplicate.

Non-coding RNA.Non-coding RNA: lncRNA Synaptotagmin-1, which regulates PRNP expression.

Epigenetic factors: Hypermethylation of the PRNP promoter in prion-like propagation

Material used.Description: Microtubule stability was measured in SH-SY5Y cells expressing mutant MAPT (p.G347D).

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced microtubule stability and impaired axonal transport in SH-SY5Y cells with p.G347D mutation.

Technical replicates.Description: Each transfection was analyzed in triplicate.

Epigenetic factors: Hypomethylation of the MAPT promoter in tau pathology
